mapper.select: SELECT distinct m.id id, m.parentid parentId, m.createtime createTime, m.title title, m.mlevel mlevel, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM hz_test.ums_admin_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN hz_test.ums_role r ON arr.roleid = r.id LEFT JOIN hz_test.ums_role_menu_relation rmr ON r.id = rmr.roleid LEFT JOIN hz_test.ums_menu m ON rmr.menuid = m.id WHERE arr.adminid = #{adminId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL /*GROUP BY m.id*/

SELECT distinct m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.createTime createTime, m.title title, m.mlevel mlevel, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM hz_test.ums_role_menu_relation rmr LEFT JOIN hz_test.ums_menu m ON rmr.menuid = m.id WHERE rmr.roleid = #{roleId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL /*GROUP BY m.id*/
